name: Mirabilis Ventures
overview: Mirabilis Ventures, Inc. is a private equity firm specializing in investments in acquisitions and distressed companies. It typically invests in security and investigation, information technology, data management, consulting, construction services, and human resources sectors. The firm may utilize its own and direct funding for an acquisition or investment, or, syndicate an investment to high-net-worth investors and or institutional allies. Mirabilis Ventures Inc. is based in Orlando, Florida. On May 27, 2008, it filed a voluntary petition for reorganization under Chapter 11 in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Middle District of Florida, Orlando.
